resources.string: The place where you should go to go on with the activity is shown in the map
Choose the results you want to see
Choose the performance you want to see:
You have already deposited all of the elements, now you can continue to the next task
Now you will have to decide between depositing the elemennts you picked or continouing to the next task
Now you will have to decide between keep depositing or continouing to the next task
Now you will have to decide between depositing the elemennts you picked or finish the activity.
You have not deposited any elements.
There are no more tasks for you to do, you will have to choose between keep depositing or finish the activity.
There are still elements in the bag. Are you sure of finishing the actitvity? If you are not, you can keep depositing.
Sorry! You have read a wrong code. In the map you will see where you should head to.
You have finish all the tasks!
Once you have reach the highlighted place, you will have scan the code.
Now you will have to choose between checking your performance or leaving the activity.
Are you sure about leaving the activity? If you say yes, you wont be able to check you performance anymore."
Where do you want to go?
The code you have read is invalid.
You have not collected elements yet.
For each task you get will see collected elements.
Now you will have to select every element you want to deposit
You have collected for this task:
Now you will have to next task
Now you will have end the activity
You finished last task without elements.
Here we will show you some of the features you will need to know to solve this activity
You will see the place where you should aim to solve a task
Throughout this activity maps will be shown where you will be able to see where you should go to next
Once you reach the place when the next task is located, you will have to read the QR code to get the task
When you press "More Info" you will get extra material either about the activity or the task. You will also see the complete task statement
This option let you visualize all the items you have collected throughout the activity
When you chose "Help", you will be able to request the teacher´s help: either beacuse you don´t understand a task or beacuse of any other event in which you consider it necessary

When you find yourselves doing a task that requires collecting elements, you will have to chose one by one the elements according to the task and "read it's QR code". When you do this, the element will be added to a list and to your bag
When you find yourselves doing a task that requires depositing elements, you will have to select them from the list you visualize and chose deposit
You will be able to see your performance at a task
After finishing each task you will be able to see your performance at it
You will be able to see your global performance
After finishing the activity you will be able to see your performance at every task, both the depositing ones and the collecting ones
UNLP - Facultad de Informática - LIFIA y CICPBA
